attributes.action: dissolve parliament immediately in light of recent morally indefensible expenses claims by current MPs
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The recent revelations about MPs expenses pour shame on the House Of Commons. Members' contempt for taxpayers money and their willingness to take advantage of an opaque expenses system lowers their standing in the eyes of the electorate to the extent that the signatories of this petition see no alternative to restoring trust in British parliamentary democracy than the dissolution of Parliament and the holding of a General Election.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
